introduction: SYNOPSISHeo Bong-gu comes to Seoul from the countryside to find his childhood friend Ahn Geum-sun. He begins delivering food for a Chinese restaurant to make ends meet but is fired for giving away food to a beggar. He runs into Geum-sun and she introduces him to work as a waiter at a nightclub called Star Salon. But he draws attention to himself by trying to protect Geum-sun instead of trying to bring in customers. He lures her to a motel, but his conscience takes over and he leaves without even touching her. When Star Salon goes out of business, they decide to start a new life together.故事一个年轻人，胡凤菊去汉城找儿时的朋友金进，雇了一家中餐馆来解决他的饮食问题。秀峰 - 市中心工作作为像在一次偶然的机会遇到了教堂前的明星美容院服务员angeumsun让我们只是想保护geumsun不引起注意，美容院经营的客星，克服了经济衰退受到眩光。那个不能一心一意的黄金法则，只有一天就把他引到客栈，但是他天生的清白就出来了。当星沙门关门时，金山也解除了女主人的生命，开始了bonggu和masamune。
